mapper.insert: insert into media_data(media_name, media_title, media_content, reporter_name, reporter_ID,writeDate, last_writeDate, last_media_title, last_media_content, keyword, keyword_type, url) values (#{media_name}, #{media_title}, #{media_content}, #{reporter_name}, #{reporter_ID}, #{writeDate}, #{keyword}, #{last_writeDate}, #{last_media_title}, #{last_media_content}, #{keyword_type}, #{url})
mapper.update: update media_data set media_name = #{media_name}, media_title = #{media_title}, media_content = #{media_content}, reporter_name = #{reporter_name}, writeDate = #{writeDate}, last_writeDate = #{last_writeDate}, last_media_title = #{last_media_title}, last_media_content = #{last_media_content}, keyword = #{keyword}, keyword_type = #{keyword_type}, url = #{url}, updateDate = now() where media_idx = #{media_idx}
mapper.select: select * from media_data where textType is not null and community_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or community_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by createdate limit #{startPage}, #{pageUnit}
select count(*) from media_data where media_name = #{keyword}
select count(*) from media_data where reporter_name = #{reporter_name}
